<<<<<<< HEAD
The duello or single combat from antiquitie deriued into this kingdome of England, with seuerall kindes, and ceremonious formes thereof from good authority described. Selden, John, 1584-1654.
[6], 54 p.
Printed by G[eorge] E[ld] for I. Helme, and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Dunstans Church-yard, in Fleet-streete, London : 1610.
Dedication signed: I.S., i.e. John Selden. Printer's name from STC. Running title reads: Single combat. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
